mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, CLAIM_MONTH AS claimMonth, COST_GUBUN AS costGubun, DETAIL_ITEM_GUBUN AS detailItemGubun, SEQ_NO AS seqNo, WORK_DATE AS workDate, INSPECTION_MONTH AS inspectionMonth, BILLING_AMT AS billingAmt, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, DETAIL_CONTENT AS detailContent FROM ATMS_02001290

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, CLAIM_MONTH AS claimMonth, COST_GUBUN AS costGubun, DETAIL_ITEM_GUBUN AS detailItemGubun, SEQ_NO AS seqNo, WORK_DATE AS workDate, INSPECTION_MONTH AS inspectionMonth, BILLING_AMT AS billingAmt, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, DETAIL_CONTENT AS detailContent FROM ATMS_02001290 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001290 SET CLAIM_MONTH = #{claimMonth}, COST_GUBUN = #{costGubun}, DETAIL_ITEM_GUBUN = #{detailItemGubun}, SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}, WORK_DATE = #{workDate}, INSPECTION_MONTH = #{inspectionMonth}, BILLING_AMT = #{billingAmt}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, DETAIL_CONTENT = #{detailContent} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001290 ( TX_ID, CLAIM_MONTH, COST_GUBUN, DETAIL_ITEM_GUBUN, SEQ_NO, WORK_DATE, INSPECTION_MONTH, BILLING_AMT, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, CORNER_NAME, DETAIL_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{claimMonth}, #{costGubun}, #{detailItemGubun}, #{seqNo}, #{workDate}, #{inspectionMonth}, #{billingAmt}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{cornerName}, #{detailContent} )
